00021 #ifndef _ZGPD_COMMON_H_
00022 #define _ZGPD_COMMON_H_

00024                     Includes section
00025 ******************************************************************************/
00026 #include <zgpCommon.h>
00027 
00028 /******************************************************************************
00029 //                               ZGP Data Structures
00030 ******************************************************************************/
00031 #define NO_OF_ATTRIBUTE_REPORT_FIELD      1
00032 #define NO_OF_ATTR_RECORDS                1
00033 
00034 /******************************************************************************
00035                                ZGP Prototypes
00036 ******************************************************************************/
00037 typedef enum _ZgpState_t// zgpManager possible states.
00038 {
00039      ZGP_IDLE_STATE = 0x00,
00040      ZGP_RESET_REQ_STATE,
00041      ZGP_DATA_REQ_STATE,
00042      ZGP_CHANNEL_REQ_STATE,
00043      ZGP_COMMISSION_REQ_STATE,
00044      ZGP_DECOMMISSIONING_REQ_STATE,
00045      ZGP_SUCCESS_GPDF_REQ_STATE
00046 }ZgpState_t;
00047 
00048 typedef enum  
00049 {
00050     ZGP_RESET_REQ_ID      = ZGP_RESET_REQ_STATE,
00051     ZGP_DATA_REQ_ID       = ZGP_DATA_REQ_STATE,
00052     ZGP_CHANNEL_REQ_ID    = ZGP_CHANNEL_REQ_STATE,
00053     ZGP_COMMISSION_REQ_ID = ZGP_COMMISSION_REQ_STATE,
00054     ZGP_DECOMMISSIONING_REQ_ID = ZGP_DECOMMISSIONING_REQ_STATE,
00055     ZGP_SUCCESS_GPDF_REQ_ID = ZGP_SUCCESS_GPDF_REQ_STATE
00056 } ZgpRequestId_t;
00057 
00059 typedef struct
00060 {
00061   void    *next;
00062   uint8_t requestId;
00063   bool presenceInQueue;
00064 } ZGP_Service_t;
00065 
00066 /******************************************************************************
00067   Finds next channel to scan from mask channels.
00068   Parameters:
00069     startChannel - pointer to the start channel for search.
00070     mask - mask of channels to scan.
00071   Returns:
00072     false - if channel was not found, true otherwise.
00073 ******************************************************************************/
00074 INLINE bool findNextSupportedChannel(uint8_t *startChannel, uint32_t mask)
00075 {
00076   uint8_t i = *startChannel;
00077   bool result = false;
00078   i++;
00079   for (; i < sizeof(mask)*NO_OF_BITS_IN_BYTE; i++)
00080   {
00081     if ((1ul << i) & mask)
00082     {
00083       *startChannel = i;
00084       result = true;
00085       break;
00086     }
00087   }
00088   return result;
00089 }
00090 
00091 #endif /*_ZGPD_COMMON_H_*/
